message.body: Hey Marilyn lost my job this week Loreal pulled out of the broker
You mentioned you had sold a few of our items if you did
Hi there. Sorry to hear you're unemployed. I was ready to mail a check and then more stuff of yours sold. The globe, platter and salt and peppers.
I left today for vacation - visiting my Aunt Flo in Wisconsin. I'll be back next Thursday and I'll get paid for August from the booth and can cut you a check then.
Sounds good see you when you get back
